website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung SyncMaster 2333HD is a great low-price choice for buyers looking for an HDTV-monitor hybrid.
pros: The Samsung SyncMaster 2333HD has a plethora of connection options, including two HDMI ports
It also has built-in speakers, a fairly bright screen, and good performance for games
cons: The Samsung SyncMaster 2333HD lacks ergonomic options, and tends to mute colors when viewing movies
Also, its onscreen display is difficult to navigate without using the included remote control

customer_reviews.title: One of my most satisfing purchases.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased 3 of these TV / Monitors about 4 or more years ago. I have only used them as TVs, so I can't comment on the monitor side of things. Love them so much i went to purchase another but it seems Samsung does not currently off an equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase for me. Use it next to the main monitor. As a TV is has outstanding video properties. Multiple hookups with HDMI as a second monitor it works great. Highly recommend. Samsung is a great product. Timely delivery and the typical Amazon warranty and reliable shipping. Not sure how to rate it higher.
customer_reviews.author: DenverJohn1

customer_reviews.title: everything about it is great clear crisp quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm still using this monitor today, everything about it is great clear crisp quality.
customer_reviews.author: SolidSShady

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in-store on Black Friday. Loved it, bought another one for my daughter on Amazon in June ...cheaper than Black Friday. Great picture. Sound is clear but can't seem to set volume high enough. Attached a small set of computer speakers I had lying around and sound is much better. I bought the first to use as a bedroom TV but have occasionaly hooked it to my computer for Hulu and other webTV. 23 inch is a good compromise (not too big, not too small). The second one was for my daughter's college dorm room for dual use as a TV and as a monitor to use with her laptop.
customer_reviews.author: DadinMD

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in good order, securely packaged and intact. That's about all that I found to my liking on this machine. We had intended the unit for our bedroom but found the viewing angle insufficient. The menus could not correct color wowing when viewed at any angle other than horizontal or above. This did not fit our purpose. We might have placed the unit in another location but for the problem with the power connection which was intermittent. The plug-in was far from secure. We sent it back as faulty.
customer_reviews.author: B Flat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent HDTV
customer_reviews.text: I can recommend this seller and the product quality. Quick delivery Excellent Sound, and Perfect image and full 1080p Lack AV connectors, plus HDMI connectors
customer_reviews.author: Max Rojas

customer_reviews.title: No A/V input connector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, but watch out! It does not have the standard yellow video input (a/v). Besides the PC and HDMI inputs you can only connect it to a component (YUV connector Red/Blue/Green) Other than that it is great. Check out pictures of the back panel and make sure it has the connectors you need.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Galeano

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: The television was great. It had a very good picture. The sound was average but acceptable. This unit is designed to be a television or computer monitor. After a week or so it would turn on and then the screen would black out after about five minutes of viewing so I had to send it back. Thank you Amazon for your return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and delivery as advertised. Everything was working very well and fast delivery too. 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hertz

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint that I have is the speakers. They could have put in better ones. Every thing else is great and I have really come to trust Samsung for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Is more a tv than a monitor, but the style, the feel and look excelent, is a good option, Great Contrast. The bad: Worst menu ever seen
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Guzman Artavia

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV for use just as a monitor. I use it everyday for gaming and such. I LOVE this TV, its perfect for a bedroom or small office. I wanted a monitor that would show great quality for my gaming needs, and I find that is exactly what I got. I have not used it for regular TV viewing at this point, but I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is looking for a set to have in a smaller space.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Overscan needs to be adjusted every time you switch inputs & the controls are on the side
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying it to use with just one PC then you wont have much of a problem. It seems you need to adjust the overscan to display the entire screen other wise you will chop off a bit on each side. This is useless as a second or shop monitor where you occasionally plug in a Raspberry Pi, a NVR, a laptop etc. Real pity since I have been using and loved SyncMasters for many many years. Complicating this is the fact that Samsung decided to hide all the controls on the side. If they have room for a "Samsung" (advertisement) on the front, they have room for volume and menu controls on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laferriere

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV especially for the $240-$250 price tag. After read several reviews about this TV, the only thing I was skeptical about was the speakers being loud enough. Trust me, they're loud enough. Its not like you should be expecting surround sound theater quality, but they definitely get the job done, and that's what matters. I'd also like to point out that this is probably the cheapest name brand TV you're going to find for the size, and it has all the neccessary output/input connections that you would be expecting to see on the back of most TV's. My advise to you, go to Samsung's website and view the back to know what connections are available...
customer_reviews.author: Eric Suburu

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of these in place with no issues thus far. Great picture quality - using them as monitors. Comes with all of the connect-able cable types, DVI, VGA, and HDMI, unlike a lot of monitors. Remote will cause all monitors in that direction to turn on or off, this could be a plus or a minus depending on application.
customer_reviews.author: FilbertR

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The previous review pretty much nails it, except I had no speaker hum using DVI. As a monitor it is sharp, not so much for the TV. This might be because I'm plugging the cable directly to the tuner, rather than using a box. The cable is set up for non digital TVs and the monitor has a digital tuner. I use headphones while watching the ballgame while my wife watches the HD TV. It's also handy while waiting for downloads etc.
customer_reviews.author: phil w

customer_reviews.title: I understand why there is negative reviews on this item
customer_reviews.text: I would say this tv/monitor has it's problems with the connector on the back of this tv for power, the cord feels loose when it's plugged in. To solve any confusions about this is, just put like a foam like material underneath the cord in place so the tv doesn't black out once in a while whatever u r watching, other than that this tv/monitor is great. Bought it for $221 w/ free shipping back in the beginning of the year on Amazon of course, great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: I got it on time and set it up as soon as I could to try it out. Works very nicely. The Dark colors on the screen in dark movies or video games are very dark. It makes it kind of hard to see sometimes. Other than that it has been a great machine. I would highly recommond it.
customer_reviews.author: Benchballking

product_meta.title: Samsung 2333HD 23-Inch Multi-Function Full 1080p HDTV LCD Monitor
product_meta.description: Now you can take a break from work and watch HDTV. The 2333HD-1 monitor features a built-in 1080p digital HDTV tuner - which means you can play high definition games and watch blu-ray movies. With sharp, full HD images, you'll be amazed at the quality. It also has a chic glossy bezel and unique design on the back. This Samsung monitor gives you something beautiful to stare at, whether it's on or off.
feature_bullets: Built-in full HD 1080p digital HDTV tuner so you can watch both TV and HDTV, play high definition games, and watch blu-ray movies
1920 x 1080 full HD resolution delivers sharp, crystal clear images with vidid color
The High Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) connection makes your monitor a multimedia centerpiece and lets you easily
Glossy Black bezel and unique design on back
10,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio gives you sharper image quality that's sure to catch your eye

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
